alert.note: Alert for Dillon (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Robeson and east central Dillon Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 432 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Of The Border, or 8 miles east of Dillon, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Pembroke, Fairmont, Rowland, Boardman, Hamer, South Of The Border, Hestertown, Barnesville, Buie, Robeson Community College, Barker Ten Mile, Purvis, Elrod, Proctorville, Mcdonald, Orrum, Raynham, and Southeastern Regional Medical Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 197 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
